title: Transportation | University of Illinois at Chicago
contents: Skip to the content of this page ,  the main menu , the site search form , the site home page .           Transportation     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Transportation      Transportation   Main Menu    Buses    Paratransit           Cancellations and No-Shows    Coverage Area and Hours         Night Ride           Coverage Area    Code of Conduct    Setting up and using a TransLōc Account    Night Ride Trip Feedback         Abandoned Bikes    Vehicles           CARS    Chauffeur Service         Moving Service     Eyebrow menu    Administrative Services    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                              Transportation       Transportation              UIC Transportation provides a variety of automotive services to the UIC campus community, including Intracampus bus routes, the Library shuttle, Night Ride, chauffeur service, departmental moving services, and rental/repair of university owned vehicles.  Our Mission: To provide safe, efficient, and barrier-free transit services that support the innovative dynamics of the UIC community.  We encourage you to take advantage of the UIC Safe app that is available for your mobile device at no cost.         News and Announcements      Suspended Transportation Services    Posted on March 18, 2020          Available Transportation Services    Posted on March 18, 2020          2020 Campus Commuter Survey    Posted on January 29, 2020          Intersession Transportation Services    Posted on December 19, 2019               Bus Service           Buses and Shuttles  Bus schedules and route information for the Intracampus Buses and Library Shuttle.             Paratransit  Paratransit Service is available seven days a week for students, faculty, and staff with disabilities.             Night Ride  Transportation option offered after the operational hours of our bus circuit.             UI Ride  UI Ride is an intercampus shuttle that provides transportation between Chicago and Urbana-Champaign.             Campus Auto Rental Service  The Campus Auto Rental Service provides vehicles for use on university business.             Chauffeur Service  Chauffeur Services are available to UIC faculty, staff and students.             Abandoned Bicycle Removal  Policy on the removal of abandoned bicycles.             Moving Service  All moving services can be requested by submitting a billable service request through FMWeb.             Map   Address: Transportation Facility (MC 269), 1351 South Morgan Street, Chicago, IL 60607 Phone: (312) 99 6-2842 — Fax: (312) 996-0165 Office Hours: 7:00AM to 5:00PM (CT) Monday through Friday
